registerArbiter(uint256,uint16,uint8).details: Registers an Arbiter for the User.

params.currencyType: Type of currency for the payment value        0 - ETH, 1 - USD
params.paymentType: Type of payment that the arbiter takes.        0 - Flat Rate, 1 - Percentage
params.paymentValue: Unit of payment based on currencyType and paymentType

registerCandidate(uint64,uint16).details: Register Candidate for the User.Note: Requires that the address is a registered user.

params.currencyType: The type of currency to be paid in.
params.hourlyRate: Based on currency, the hourly suggested amount for payment.

registerEmployer().details: Registers an Employee for the User.

updateArbiterRate(uint256,uint16,uint8).details: Updates the given arbiter's rate of payment.

params.currencyType: Type of currency for the payment value        0 - ETH, 1 - USD
params.paymentType: Type of payment that the arbiter takes.        0 - Flat Rate, 1 - Percentage
params.paymentValue: unit of payment based on currencyType and paymentType

updateCandidateRate(uint64,uint16).details: Update Candidate's rate of hourly pay and currency type.

params.currencyType: Type of hourly pay. 0 - Eth, 1 - USD.
params.hourlyRate: The rate of hourly pay for a particular currency.                    For USD, a unit of pay is a cent. For                    Ethereum, the unit of pay is a wei.

devdoc.title: User Contract which represents a User's information describing their price points and skills for employment, for being a candidate, and for being an Arbiter for jobs.
